content: Yes, finding the right balance between intuition and logical reasoning is key in making ethical decisions. Both intuition and logical reasoning have their own strengths and limitations, and integrating them together can help us arrive at a more comprehensive and nuanced understanding of ethical dilemmas. Ultimately, ethical decisions should be based on a well-rounded approach that considers all relevant factors and approaches the situation from different angles to ensure that the best possible decision is made.  So, finding the right balance between them could lead us to effective ethical decision-making.
